# Topic 04 — 邮件：感谢 + 邀请

## Directions (要求)
<Bilingual cn="假设你在暑期海外学习项目中得到了托马斯教授的很多帮助。写一封电子邮件：">Suppose you received much help from Prof. Thomas during your summer study abroad program. Write an e-mail to</Bilingual>
1.  <Bilingual cn="感谢他，并且">thank him, and</Bilingual>
2.  <Bilingual cn="邀请他访问中国。">invite him to visit China.</Bilingual>
<Bilingual cn="你应该在答题纸上写100个单词左右。">You should write about 100 words on the ANSWER SHEET.</Bilingual>
<br/>
<Bilingual cn="不要用你自己的名字。用“Li Ming”代替。(10分)">Do not use your own name. Use “Li Ming” instead. (10 points)</Bilingual>
<br/>
## ✏️ 参考范文
<Bilingual cn="亲爱的托马斯教授：">Dear Prof. Thomas,</Bilingual>
<p><Bilingual cn="回想起在贵国参加留学项目的那个暑假，我非常高兴。今天写信来是想表达感谢，并邀请您来中国旅行。">I am quite pleased to recall the summer when I attended the study abroad program in your country. Today, I am writing for the purpose of extending my gratitude and inviting you to visit China.</Bilingual></p>
<p><Bilingual cn="首先，正是您的鼎力相助，使我得享一段舒适且获益良多的学习之旅。因此，我非常感激您的帮助。">To begin with, it was your tremendous help that enabled me to enjoy a comfortable and fruitful trip of learning. Thus, I am deeply grateful to you for your help.</Bilingual> <Bilingual cn="此外，我知道您很喜欢中国的古建筑。因此，我觉得您可以在闲暇时亲自参观一下长城、颐和园和故宫等。">In addition, I know that you are fond of China’s ancient architecture. Accordingly, I deem that it is advisable for you to visit in person the Great Wall, the Summer Palace, the Forbidden City and so on in your spare time.</Bilingual></p>
<p><Bilingual cn="期待早日收到您的肯定答复，好让我报答您。">I am looking forward to your favorable reply at your earliest convenience so that I can repay you.</Bilingual></p>
<Bilingual cn="您真诚的">Yours sincerely,</Bilingual>
<br/>
<Bilingual cn="李明">Li Ming</Bilingual>
